ru: Стоя на носке опорной стопы, поднимите колено.
en: Balance on the ball of your standing foot while lifting your knee.

ru: Согнутое колено поднимите выше тазобедренного сустава.
en: Lift your bent knee above hip height.

ru: Сохраняя стойку на опорном носке, выведите колено другой ноги в сторону.

en: Stretch your leg outward to the side.

enSynonyms: Watch your breath as it flows.
Notice the rhythm of your breath.
Observe the movement of your breath.
Keep your awareness on your breath.
Concentrate on your breath as it comes and goes.
Let your focus rest on your breathing.

en: Lower your feet onto the mat.
